headline: Assessing Extra Space Storage (EXR) Valuation After Recent Share Momentum And Undervaluation Signals
summary: Recent share performance and business snapshot Extra Space Storage (EXR) has attracted attention after recent share moves, with the stock closing at $140.01 and returns of 1 day at 1.1%, past week at 3.6%, and month roughly flat. Over the past 3 months, EXR shows a total return of 4.5%, while the 1 year figure is a 6.4% decline. Longer term, the 3 year total return is a 2.1% decline, compared with a 45.0% gain over 5 years.
